scenario_text.value: Hm? Who’s there?
Ryo? Are you okay?

Huh? What kind of question is that? I’m fine,
what’s it look like?

Oh, okay then. Just don’t push yourself too
hard, okay?

Heh, look who’s talking. You push yourself
harder than anyone.

You’ve always got to be the leader, take on
everything. You’re the one who needs a break.

I’m done with all these desperate situations.
I’m sick of them already.

(They’re both looking out for each other.
Maybe because they both almost died.)
Hm? Takuma? Something wrong?

Yeah, what are you spying on us? Talk about
rude. You got something to say?
Ryo and Shuuji are encouraging each other.
Know your limits.
Do what you have to.
Stay careful.

Just know your limits. That means no pushing
things, and no heroics. Especially you, Ryo.
Me? When have I ever gone too far?

Haha, just remember to take your own advice,
Takuma.

Sometimes you need to push things to do what
needs to be done. Think of Haru and Miyuki.

They don’t have partners like we do. We have
to find them right away.

Look, I know what you’re saying, but how’s
pushing things going to help us find them?

Ryo, you don’t have to put it like that. And
Takuma, I know you mean well...

...but it’s important not to let yourself get
too flustered.

Now, let’s all try and control ourselves so
we can seize the moment when the time comes.

You two be careful, okay? You’re both
important members of this team, after all.

And we all need to make it back to our world
together.
Psh, like I didn’t know that already.

You’re right. We should all be careful so we
can act when the time comes. You too, Takuma.
Right... Yeah.

Okay, I think I’ll get back to it. I’m going
to go check over there.

Come on, man, give it a rest. You’ve been at
it this whole time! I can check over there.

Hey, you’ve been working just as hard. What
do you say we both take a break?
All right, I guess...

(The two of them actually make a pretty great
team.)

(They’re good at keeping an eye on each other
as they work. I’ll just leave this to them.)
